title: Eradication
alt: When you get to hell, tell smallpox we say hello.
transcript:
[Megan holding a hand up, palm held out, is walking with Cueball.]
Megan: Even if the threat eventually fades, thanks to vaccines and stuff,[They walk on, both with their arms down.]
Megan: And it becomes just another circulating common cold virus,[Megan holds her hand up in a fist, while Cueball hold his hand to his chin as they walk on.]
Megan: I think we should pursue global eradication of SARS-CoV-2 out of spite.
Cueball: Revenge-based public health policy. I like it.
